title: thiago007
author: thiago007
created_time: May 11, 2022, 09:21:04 PMLast edit: July 09, 2022, 03:51:14 AM by thiago007

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Do you know what you're looking to get for these or just fielding offers?

comments.author: bill gator
comments.body: Quote from: ChiBitCTy on May 13, 2022, 04:20:03 PMDo you know what you're looking to get for these or just fielding offers?Call me crazy, but I swear there was a previous statement about trying to sell as a lot for $1,100 or 0.03619 BTC at the time I am writing this. Correct me if I'm wrong, but I'd say that's probably a good place to start.

comments.author: thiago007
comments.body: Quote from: ChiBitCTy on May 13, 2022, 04:20:03 PMDo you know what you're looking to get for these or just fielding offers?I'm asking $600 or maybe a good offer we're always open. Thanks for the interest.Quote from: bill gator on May 13, 2022, 04:22:02 PMCall me crazy, but I swear there was a previous statement about trying to sell as a lot for $1,100 or 0.03619 BTC at the time I am writing this. Correct me if I'm wrong, but I'd say that's probably a good place to start.It was what I asked for, but there were 8 of them. I sold some separately since several people asked me for some for their collection.

comments.author: bill gator
comments.body: That makes sense, I appreciate you clarifying so that I don't feel like I'm losing my mind.Are you willing to continue selling individuals or would you prefer the rest be sold as a lot?If I could make a request, maybe set one aside for a raffle - I'd be willing to bet that a $600 price tag is too high for a lot of interested parties. Maybe a raffle might be a fun way to sell one, and I'd certainly buy a reasonably priced ticket (or two).

comments.author: thiago007
comments.body: Quote from: bill gator on May 13, 2022, 04:35:55 PMThat makes sense, I appreciate you clarifying so that I don't feel like I'm losing my mind.Are you willing to continue selling individuals or would you prefer the rest be sold as a lot?If I could make a request, maybe set one aside for a raffle - I'd be willing to bet that a $600 price tag is too high for a lot of interested parties. Maybe a raffle might be a fun way to sell one, and I'd certainly buy a reasonably priced ticket (or two).I'm always open to requests from people, I think a raffle would be an option eventually.

comments.author: Dustin westerbeck
comments.body: If you’re interested I would give you $60 each for the copper chips?

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Throw them on ebay. Moonbits-200 each, hodl-150 each. At that price they should sell relatively quick.

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: Quote from: thiago007 on May 11, 2022, 09:21:04 PM I have for sale for those who are interested, send me PM1 holdClub Brass Error póker Chips2 holdClub Cooper póker chips2 Moonbits Silver Hey man! I'm wondering if you would be interested in some sort of trade? If so please PM me!

comments.author: Dustin westerbeck
comments.body: I will do the your offer for the two copper chips if still interested and available.
